cast.name: C.奥布雷·史密斯 C. Aubrey Smith
莫里斯·舍瓦利耶 Maurice Chevalier
珍妮特·麦克唐纳 Jeanette MacDonald

writer.name: 小乔治·马里昂 George Marion Jr.
利奥波德·马尔尚 Léopold Marchand

director.name: 鲁本·马莫利安 Rouben Mamoulian

introduction: When Parisienne tailor Maurice Courtelin learns that one of his aristocratic clients, the Viscount Gilbert de Varèze, is a deadbeat who never pays for the merchandise he acquires, he heads off to try and collect what is owed to him. He gets little in the way of cash from the Viscount who is desperate that his uncle, the Duke D'Artelines not learn of his debts. He suggests that Maurice spend a little time at the chateau until the money can be found. The Duke takes an immediate liking to Maurice - who's been introduced as a Baron - but that's not the case for the Princess Jeanette who, after an encounter with him him on the road earlier that day. Over time Jeannette falls in love with him Written by garykmcd
